title: Phone wont turn on. If i hold power button i get message saying fast boot mode and device locked
content:
Phone wont turn on. Only thing i can make happen is if i hold the power button for about 4 seconds and i get a black screen with white text regarding some information about the phone. It also says, " Device state: Locked" and above all the white text in red it says Fastboot mode in red
Unsure how to proceed from here
